content.raw:
I committed some changes directly to this branch: 61ff8f9.

The only problem I'm having now is not being able to test the plugin example. I haven't looked at the code yet and I'm not sure how it's supposed to work, and it's currently impossible to test changing values on the GUI.
content.html:
I committed some changes directly to this branch: 61ff8f9.

The only problem I'm having now is not being able to test the plugin example. I haven't looked at the code yet and I'm not sure how it's supposed to work, and it's currently impossible to test changing values on the GUI.

content.raw: I'm not sure where the problem is, but it's very hard to edit values on the GUI overlay because the mouse events go to the 3D scene behind instead.
content.html: I'm not sure where the problem is, but it's very hard to edit values on the GUI overlay because the mouse events go to the 3D scene behind instead.

content.raw: Sure, make changes as needed. I won't be around over the next week, so have at it.
content.html: Sure, make changes as needed. I won't be around over the next week, so have at it.

content.raw: This link shows how to use pre-made plugins. Maybe the [tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=plugins_hello_world&cat=write_plugin) on what plugins are would be better here?
content.html: This link shows how to use pre-made plugins. Maybe the tutorial on what plugins are would be better here?
